items.question: What sectors does Integrated Analytics serve?
items.answer: We serve a wide range of sectors including: banking and financial services, healthcare, government sector, retail, manufacturing, and transportation. Our solutions are designed to meet the specific regulatory and operational requirements of each sector.

items.question: What is the expected duration for a digital transformation project?
items.answer: Duration varies according to project scope and requirements. Basic analytics implementation may take 4 to 8 weeks, while comprehensive transformation projects extend from 6 to 12 months. We provide a detailed timeline during the discovery phase and adopt flexible methodologies to deliver value incrementally.

items.question: Do you offer cloud and on-premise solutions?
items.answer: We offer multiple deployment options including: public cloud (AWS, Azure, GCP), private cloud, on-premise deployment, and hybrid solutions. We help you choose the optimal architecture based on security, compliance, and performance requirements.

items.question: What level of support is provided after implementation?
items.answer: We provide comprehensive support including: 24/7 technical assistance, periodic system performance checks, continuous improvements, and user training. Enterprise plan clients receive priority support with guaranteed response times.

items.question: How do you ensure data security and compliance?
items.answer: Security is a fundamental pillar in all our solutions. We adhere to global best practices, implement comprehensive encryption, and conduct periodic security reviews. We ensure compliance with ISO 27001, SOC 2, and GDPR standards, in addition to sector-specific regulations like HIPAA for healthcare and PCI-DSS for financial services.

story.paragraph1: Founded in 2009, Integrated Analytics began with a simple yet powerful vision: to bridge the gap between complex data and actionable business insights. What started as a small team of passionate data scientists has grown into a full-service digital transformation partner.
story.paragraph2: Over the years, we have expanded our capabilities to include cloud services, AI/ML solutions, enterprise applications, and cybersecurity. Our growth has been driven by our unwavering commitment to client success and our ability to stay ahead of technological trends.
story.paragraph3: Today, we serve over 200 enterprise clients across multiple industries, helping them navigate their digital transformation journeys with confidence. Our team of 50+ experts brings together diverse expertise to deliver solutions that create real business value.

hero.description: We are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: This Privacy Policy describes how Integrated Analytics collects, uses, and protects your personal information when you use our website and services. By using our services, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy.

dataCollection.title: Information We Collect
dataCollection.content:
We collect information that you provide directly to us, including:
• Contact information (name, email, phone number)
• Company information
• Communication preferences
• Information provided through contact forms
• Technical data (IP address, browser type, device information)

dataUsage.title: How We Use Your Information
dataUsage.content:
We use the collected information to:
• Provide and improve our services
• Respond to your inquiries and requests
• Send relevant updates and marketing communications (with your consent)
• Analyze usage patterns to improve user experience
• Comply with legal obligations

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. These measures include encryption, access controls, and regular security assessments.

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your experience on our website. You can control cookie settings through your browser preferences. Essential cookies are required for basic functionality, while analytics and marketing cookies help us understand and improve our services.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParty.content: We may share your information with trusted third-party service providers who assist us in operating our website and services. These providers are contractually obligated to protect your information and use it only for the purposes we specify.

userRights.title: Your Rights
userRights.content:
You have the right to:
• Access your personal information
• Request correction of inaccurate data
• Request deletion of your data
• Opt-out of marketing communications
• Request data portability
To exercise these rights, please contact us using the information provided below.

updates.title: Policy Updates
updates.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any significant changes by posting the new policy on this page and updating the 'Last Updated' date. We encourage you to review this policy periodically.
